qualtrics.subtitle: Export this survey to QSF file

csv.subtitle: Export this survey to CSV file

rows.subtitle: Set the amount of rows to export in CSV file

js.subtitle: Export this survey to JavaScript file

json.subtitle: Export this survey to JSON file that you can import afterwards

import.title: Import a file
import.description: Import a QSF or JSON file to be parsed into surveys

description.value: Enter your description here! Example: 'Here are two profiles A and B.

instructions.value: Enter your instructions here! Example: 'Do you prefer A or B?'

outcomeType.subtitle: Select the type of outcome you want to use for your survey. You can choose between a single outcome, multiple outcomes, or a range of outcomes.

oneProfile.subtitle: List of attribute-level pairs that can not be together in a profile

crossProfiles.subtitle: List of attribute-level pairs that can not be together in different profiles

name.subtitle: You can use any name you want. Keep it simple.

numberProfiles.subtitle: Changes the number of profiles in preview section

numberTasks.subtitle: Set of choices presented to the respondent in a single screen (i.e. pair of candidates)

shuffled.value: Option to either flip columns same for repeated tasks
shuffled.subtitle: Option to either flip columns same for repeated tasks

whichRepeat.subtitle: A Task to repeat from 1 to N (the chosen number of tasks)

whereRepeat.subtitle: Where to repeat from i (the chosen task) to N + 1 (the chosen number of tasks)
